name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns GREEN for Valid Bank transactions.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension prevents users from being tricked into using phishy banking websites. Flashy green checkbox = legit website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In this election year, scammers come out of woodwork. We all should stay protected and help others stay protected. For genuine banking websites like chase.com, BECU.org or BankOfAmerica.com, the extension icon turns flashy green. For other non-banking websites, it stays gray. For example Bank0fAmerica.com will stay gray. Please alert your friends, parents, relatives to use this simple extension to stay protected.
